name: Frontgate Fighters
description:
Two (actually four) fierce battlers are fighting it out in a skillful duel, with all those fiery projectiles and eye-opening Specials. Where do you stand? How long can you last?

Featuring unique and original characters, theme presentation, and of course music! Lots of unlockables and achievements too..

Features:
● Four different fighters!
● Various special attack to challenge you!
● Simple yet deep gameplay
● Three different power-ups!
